Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays due to an earlier mechanical problem on train near the area of Medical District.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays due to an earlier mechanical problem on train near the area of Medical District.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
